verses.verse: <S%G3956>Whoever<s%> <S%G4100>believes<s%> that <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> is the <S%G5547>Christ<s%> is <S%G1080>born<s%> of <S%G2316>God;<s%> and <S%G3956>whoever<s%> <S%G25>loves<s%> the <S%G1080>Father<s%> <S%G25>loves<s%> the [child] <S%G1080>born<s%> of Him.

And <S%G5101>who<s%> is the one who <S%G3528>overcomes<s%> the <S%G2889>world,<s%> but he who <S%G4100>believes<s%> that <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> is the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>?

<S%G3778>This<s%> is the one who <S%G2064>came<s%> by <S%G5204>water<s%> and <S%G129>blood,<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ;<s%> not with the <S%G5204>water<s%> <S%G3440>only,<s%> but with the <S%G5204>water<s%> and with the <S%G129>blood.<s%>
And it is the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> who <S%G3140>bears<s%> <S%G3140>witness,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> is the <S%G225>truth.<s%>

For there are <S%G5140>three<s%> that <S%G3140>bear<s%> <S%G3140>witness,<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> and the <S%G5204>water<s%> and the <S%G129>blood;<s%> and the <S%G5140>three<s%> are in <S%G1520>agreement.<s%>

<S%G1487>If<s%> we <S%G2983>receive<s%> the <S%G3141>witness<s%> of <S%G444>men,<s%> the <S%G3141>witness<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G3173>greater;<s%> for the <S%G3141>witness<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G3778>this,<s%> that He has <S%G3140>borne<s%> <S%G3140>witness<s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> His <S%G5207>Son.<s%>

The one who <S%G4100>believes<s%> in the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2192>has<s%> the <S%G3141>witness<s%> in <S%G846>himself;<s%> the one who does not <S%G4100>believe<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> has <S%G4160>made<s%> Him a <S%G5583>liar,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> he has not <S%G4100>believed<s%> in the <S%G3141>witness<s%> that <S%G2316>God<s%> has <S%G3140>borne<s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> His <S%G5207>Son.<s%>

And the <S%G3141>witness<s%> is <S%G3778>this,<s%> that <S%G2316>God<s%> has <S%G1325>given<s%> us <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2222>life,<s%> and <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%> is in His <S%G5207>Son.<s%>

He who <S%G2192>has<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> <S%G2192>has<s%> the <S%G2222>life;<s%> he who does not <S%G2192>have<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> does not <S%G2192>have<s%> the <S%G2222>life.<s%>

<S%G3778>These<s%> <S%G3778>things<s%> I have <S%G1125>written<s%> to you who <S%G4100>believe<s%> in the <S%G3686>name<s%> of the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> in <S%G2443>order<s%> that you may <S%G3609>know<s%> that you <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2222>life.<s%>

<S%G1437>If<s%> <S%G5100>anyone<s%> <S%G3708>sees<s%> his <S%G80>brother<s%> <S%G264>committing<s%> a <S%G266>sin<s%> not [leading] to <S%G2288>death,<s%> he shall <S%G154>ask<s%> and [God] will for him <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%> to <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G264>commit<s%> <S%G264>sin<s%> not [leading] to <S%G2288>death.<s%> There is a <S%G266>sin<s%> [leading] to <S%G2288>death;<s%> I do not <S%G3004>say<s%> that he should <S%G2065>make<s%> <S%G2065>request<s%> for <S%G1565>this.<s%>
<S%G3956>All<s%> <S%G93>unrighteousness<s%> is <S%G266>sin,<s%> and there is a <S%G266>sin<s%> not [leading] to <S%G2288>death.<s%>

We <S%G3609>know<s%> that <S%G3956>no<s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G3956>one<s%> who is <S%G1080>born<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G264>sins;<s%> but He who was <S%G1080>born<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G5083>keeps<s%> him and the <S%G4190>evil<s%> <S%G4190>one<s%> does not <S%G681>touch<s%> him.
We <S%G3609>know<s%> that we are of <S%G2316>God,<s%> and the <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G2889>world<s%> <S%G2749>lies<s%> in [the power of] the <S%G4190>evil<s%> <S%G4190>one.<s%>

And we <S%G3609>know<s%> that the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2240>has<s%> <S%G2240>come,<s%> and has <S%G1325>given<s%> us <S%G1271>understanding,<s%> in <S%G2443>order<s%> that we might <S%G1097>know<s%> Him <S%G228>who<s%> is <S%G228>true,<s%> and we are in Him <S%G228>who<s%> is <S%G228>true,<s%> in His <S%G5207>Son<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ.<s%> <S%G3778>This<s%> is the <S%G228>true<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> and <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2222>life.<s%>
